t.surface: Yunus, who was nominated for the peace prize at least twice before, is the \ \ first person from Bangladesh, a country of 147 million, to win a Nobel Pr\ iz\ e. The country, form\ erly kn\ own as East Pakistan, is bordered by the Bay of Bengal, India and \ Burma.
